body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Learn about Manzanar's layers of history               Explore Manzanar's gardens               Learn the stories of those confined at Manzanar               Explore Manzanar in any season         Â     Looking for more information about Manzanar NHS? Explore the pages in this section to learn more.     News For the latest park news and events, please take a look at our news releases.   Photos & Multimedia The photo gallery has selections from photographers such as Ansel Adams, Dorothea Lange, Clem Albers, Francis Stewart, and more.   History & Culture Find stories about the people who were important to this place and learn about our museum collections.   Nature Learn about the park's wildlife and environment.   Education You can connect with the park through lesson materials and use Manzanar as your classroom.   Kids & Youth Become a Junior Ranger and learn about the park.   Management Park planning, laws and policies, and managing resources.   Bookstore Become a member of the Manzanar History Association and browse our online store.    Publications Park information is available in a number of languages.
title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
